item.title: Project 1: Titanic Survival Predictor
item.description: Do a statistical analysis of how some group of people was survived more than others. Do an exploratory data analysis(EDA) of titanic with visualizations and storytelling. Predict: Use machine learning classification models to predict the chances of passengers survival. Link to Github Repository
